title: Why we can't votekick in this game?
body:
A Lot of trolls in ranked game play. It is boring. You win your lane after player with negative attitude ruin the game. Come on Riot do some a kind of votekick please. 

{{summoner:4}}

replies.body: If you kick one of your teammates, you will be 4v5 for the rest of the game, because MOBAs don't have any sort of backfill system.

Congrats, you removed the negative player. Then what ?

You are in a 4v5 (which you'll propably lose) and this player will propably just join a new game (since he won't be allowed to rejoin your game and you didn't mention any type of punishment).

An inting or toxic player will still try if he sees a chance to win. He isn't that stupid. And someone who lost lane and fell behind can still make a comeback. Anything is better than an afk.
not if they snitch on your teams location's.

> [{quoted}](name=Corrector1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tGOHsKNo,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-02-04T21:24:52.565+0000)
>
> not if they snitch on your teams location's.

This is one way to troll that I agree, the votekick counters, but it is an uncommon way to grief (I've seen it happen only once in almost 3 years) and there are better ways to counter it anyways, such as removing cross-team chat (what's the use for it anyways, other than for flaming and griefing).
maybe the enemy can give the beaten advice how to use a champ more efficiently of how they mainly won thats what i think its use is common ground for communication.
Tragically, kicking someone midgame could be just as detrimental as having a troll; LoL has no means to replace someone midgame.
This is a way to save the game. After 3 minuts.
LOL If votekick existed here this game would be dead.
